reference.title: Teams Meeting Recording Roles
reference.shortdesc: Depending on their roles, different participants in a Teams meeting may have the ability to stop or start a recording. The organizer doesn't need to be present for a Teams meeting to be recorded.

section.p: There are several criteria that determine which participants can start or stop a recording if the meeting organizer has their cloud recording policy setting turned on.

ul.li: Has one of the following licenses: Office 365 Enterprise E1, E3, E5, F3, A1, A3, A5, M365 Business, Business Premium, or Business Essentials.
Has recording enabled by an IT admin.
Isn't a guest from another organization.

strow.stentry: Person from another org or company
